DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/realtimeki.description: Deletes a preset using the provided preset ID

parameters.description: ID of the preset to fetch
parameters.name: preset_id

max_screenshare_count.description: Maximum number of screen shares that can be active at a given time

max_video_streams.description: Maximum number of streams that are visible on a device

desktop.description: Maximum number of video streams visible on desktop devices

mobile.description: Maximum number of streams visible on mobile devices

media.description: Media configuration options. eg: Video quality

enable_high_bitrate.description: Enable High Quality Audio for your meetings

screenshare.description: Configuration options for participant screen shares

accept_waiting_requests.description: Whether this participant can accept waiting requests

hidden_participant.description: Whether this participant is visible to others or not

can_close.description: Can close plugins that are already open

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/p.description: Fetches all the presets belonging to an organization.

parameters.description: The page number from which you want your page search results to be displayed.
parameters.name: page_no

items.description: Returned by Get All Presets route

created_at.description: Timestamp this preset was created at

updated_at.description: Timestamp this preset was last updated

items.title: PresetListItem

GET /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit/p.description: Fetches details of a preset using the provided preset ID

parameters.description: ID of the preset to fetch
parameters.name: preset_id

max_screenshare_count.description: Maximum number of screen shares that can be active at a given time

max_video_streams.description: Maximum number of streams that are visible on a device

desktop.description: Maximum number of video streams visible on desktop devices

mobile.description: Maximum number of streams visible on mobile devices

media.description: Media configuration options. eg: Video quality

enable_high_bitrate.description: Enable High Quality Audio for your meetings

screenshare.description: Configuration options for participant screen shares

accept_waiting_requests.description: Whether this participant can accept waiting requests

hidden_participant.description: Whether this participant is visible to others or not

can_close.description: Can close plugins that are already open

PATCH /accounts/{account_id}/realtimekit.description: Update a preset by the provided preset ID

parameters.description: ID of the preset to fetch
parameters.name: preset_id

max_screenshare_count.description: Maximum number of screen shares that can be active at a given time

max_video_streams.description: Maximum number of streams that are visible on a device

desktop.description: Maximum number of video streams visible on desktop devices

mobile.description: Maximum number of streams visible on mobile devices

media.description: Media configuration options. eg: Video quality

screenshare.description: Configuration options for participant screen shares

accept_waiting_requests.description: Whether this participant can accept waiting requests

hidden_participant.description: Whether this participant is visible to others or not

can_close.description: Can close plugins that are already open
